Content.Text:
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Phew! I've finally made it back to town.
There was even more stuff to deal with
than I expected! I'm worn out.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm just glad I made it back in time for
winter, just as I said. It sort of
feels like this is my true home...
<PAGE>
Anyway, I'm going to head home and
relax a little. I'll see you later,
<MYNAME>. Come and see me any time.
